de.grau.organizer.notification

Class NotificationAlarmHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.grau.organizer.notification.NotificationAlarmHandler

  • public class NotificationAlarmHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler class for Notification Alarm This class is able to set a notication as well as canceling it
